title: Tomato Based Recipe
directions: (if cooking with pasta, cous cous or something similar, cook according to packet instructions whilst cooking the tomato dish).
if cooking with chicken or mince, add cooking oil to a medium size saucepan and cook over medium heat until chicken is white/golden or mince is brown.
in the same pan, add chopped vegetables and garlic, more cooking oil or butter and cook until vegetables are softened on medium-low heat.
add can of diced tomatoes and leave to simmer for 10-15 minutes, add mixed herbs.
add the meat and leave for a further 5 minutes or until warmed through.
serve by its self or with pasta, cous cous, toast or something similar, garnish with herbs.
ingredients: any vegetables you have; mushroom, zucchini, carrot. (depending on how many vegetables you have, you may need more than one can of tomatoes)
a protein base; chicken, tuna, mince, chickpeas.
something to serve with; pasta, cous cous, toast.
